snippet.title: Valley Peaks is Out Now!
snippet.description:
🐸⛰️🧗 Valley Peaks is now out Steam! 

Discover a colorful and whimsical miniature open world where each mountain presents puzzles to solve. Install radio towers atop the peaks to give the froggy inhabitants access to the world beyond the Valley. Play minigames, unlock gadgets to aid you on your journey, and uncover the memories of your past. 

Get it Now on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2107550/Valley_Peaks/

Follow us on Social Media:
https://x.com/valleypeaksgame
https://www.tiktok.com/@tubclubgames

#cozygames #gamedev #gametrailers #indiegame #newrelease #whattoplay 

Awesome stuff: http://thoseawesomeguys.com
